channel.title: 317 server loading 600+ i need help rep++
channel.description: Hello MoparScape! I got an problem...I got an 317 rsps loading 600+ [InsidiaX base] Its not a problem but i need to find how to do it... Anyways i want to turn that server to spawning pk, so i need someone to tell me how can i make it so that if you lets sayyyy do ::item 14484 1 ingame you need to pay like 30m to spawn the item,also i need help if someone can say me how can i make items donator only Thanks if you are going to help :)

item.title: 317 server loading 600+ i need help rep++
item.dc:creator: @Vukiii Vukiii
item.description:
@Vukiii wrote:

@Iownedyousohard
That is now what i asked for facepalm
Erm people i now only need someone to say me how can i add stuff to a pkpshop and change the price,also to make it so when you kill someone you get 1m cash,and how to make more pkp shops, i need 1 at home and 1 at the donorzone.
Help would be pretty cool thanks XD

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server loading 600+ i need help rep++
item.dc:creator: @iownedyouhard iownedyouhard
item.description:
@iownedyouhard wrote:

this is very easy…shit… make a command … start with

find:

String Command
in your client.java

under that add:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR TEXT")&& playerRights >= 0){ addItem(ITEMID,ITEM AMOUNT); sendMessage("You have "+cash+" left to spend");

}
